  # format:
  #   name: Format Code
  #   runs-on: ubuntu-latest
  #   steps:
  #     - uses: actions/checkout@v4
  #     - name: Setup .NET
  #       uses: actions/setup-dotnet@v4
  #       with:
  #         dotnet-version: 8.0.x
  #     - name: Restore dependencies
  #       run: dotnet restore
  #     - name: Run Code Formatter 
  #       run: dotnet format
